programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Kanta Serigala
programme.desc: seorang abang yang cuba membalas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Adiknya seorang remaja berbakat berkeinginan untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi terkenal dan berpengaruh seperti penyanyi pujaannya telah menjadi mangsa penipuan, diperkosa dan dibunuh dua lelaki yang menyamar kakitangan syarikat rakam

programme.title: Gila Gusti
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Mamat dan Zul, obses terhadap gusti dan mengidolakan ahli gusti tempatan terkenal bernama Naga. Apabila Naga tewas dalam perlawanan besarnya dan patah semangat untuk terus bergusti, Mamat dan Zul nekad untuk membantu idola mereka mencari semula semangat yang hilang demi memenangi semua kejuaraan gusti Asia Pasifik.

programme.title: Tmo Gila Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Jodoh Express
programme.desc: Maya, seorang ketua agensi mencari jodoh yang berusaha menyatukan pelanggan-pelanggannya dengan gadis atau jejaka idaman mereka. Suatu hari, agensi mereka telah didatangi seorang pelanggan wanita, Ros yang ingin menggunakan perkhidmatan mereka untuk memikat seorang gadis bernama Qalisha untuk adik lelakinya, Akmal. Namun, tanpa disangka rupa-rupanya Akmal adalah lelaki yang disukai oleh Maya dalam diam.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Datin Glam
programme.desc: Kisah Nona yang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk menjaga sepupunya, Datin Ros yang sedang sakit tenat. Datin Ros berhajat untuk suaminya Datuk Kamal mengahwini Nona sekiranya dia tidak ada lagi.

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Anak Hoki
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Tmo Dari Kerana Mata
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Dari Kerana Mata

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: 12 Ghost Fingers
programme.desc: Chow terpaksa berpindah ke rumah datuknya selepas penceraian ibu bapanya. chow mendaftar kan diri di sekolah san min. pada hari pertamanya, rakan sekelasnya memberitahunya bahawa sekolah itu membentuk mata. semasa dalam perjalanan pulang dari sekolah, chow dpt rasakan ada sesuatu telah berlaku disekolah itu dan dia ingin menyiasat apa yang dirahsiakan oleh pihak sekolah selama ini.

programme.title: Slank Nggak Ada Matinya
programme.desc: Abdee dan Ridho dipanggil oleh SLANK, sebuah band rock, untuk datang jamming dengan Bimbim dan Ivan. Ternyata, SLANK ingin membuktikan bahawa SLANK tidak bersurai walaupun personelnya hanya tinggal Bimbim, Kaka dan Ivan pergi jelajah. Abdee dan Ridho turut dijemput, dan diberi syarat untuk dapat membawakan 35 buah lagu SLANK dalam masa 3 hari sahaja. Lawatan di sekitar kawasan itu bermula, dan ketika itulah pengembaraan SLANK bermula dengan format baharu.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep14
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: Teacher Chan Ram
programme.desc: Chan Ram dibesarkan di sebuah kampung di mana ibu bapa sudah biasa menghantar anak perempuan mereka bekerja di Bangkok. Dia hanya tamat darjah 4 sahaja kerana tidak mampu untuk menyambung pelajaran. Bagaimanapun, dia membuka sekolah kecil untuk mengajar orang-orang bukit dengan sokongan ibu bapanya dan Siwapong rakan sekolahnya yang pulang ke kampung dan membantunya.

programme.title: Datin Glam

programme.desc: Amran seorang budak Delivery yang gemar berlumba secara haram motor Drag. Satu hari selepas memenagi satu perlumbaan, Amran telah di hadiahkan seorang perempuan bernama Maya sebagai habuan perlumbaan. Malang tidak berbau, mereka telah kemalangan dan Maya mati ditempat kejadian.

programme.title: Mandala Penakluk Satria Tar Tar
programme.desc: Kisah perjuangan seorang pahlawan untuk menyelamatkan negerinya dijajah oleh kaum lain. Pahlawan tersebut ke negeri penjajah untuk membantah tindakan mereka yang kejam menjajah negerinya.

programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Cassandra
programme.desc: Cassandra dan Luqman saling menyukai antara satu sama lain. Syakila yang menjadi ‘penghubung’ mereka berdua. Namun hubungan mereka merisaukan ibu Luqman kerana ibarat langit dan bumi kerana Luqman dibesarkan dalam kehidupan nelayan tidak seperti Cassandra.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Anak Buta Mata Yang Menjadi Satu-Satunya Permata Dalam Keluarga
programme.desc: Mima, anak berkeperluan khas, menjadi tulang belakang keluarga. Dia menjual keropok untuk rawatan ibunya bernama, Lastri. Pada suatu hari, Mima telah difitnah kerana melakukan kecurian dengan mengambil dompet di dalam kereta.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep85
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep11
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga Ep11

Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.

programme.title: Sayang Gue Khusus Cuma Buat Pengguna Baru

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep75
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. programme.title: Doa Ibu Terzalimi Menuntun Anak Yang Lupa Diri Untuk Bertaubat
programme.desc: Puan Manik sudah tua dan tidak boleh lagi bekerja sebagai buruh di pasar. Anak lelaki Puan Manik, Andi, bekerja sebagai penunggang teksi motosikal. Namun, dia tidak meringankan kehidupan ibunya. Dia memaksa ibunya mencari lebih banyak wang supaya dia dapat memenuhi hasrat gaya hidup isterinya, Vita.

programme.title: Ditto

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.desc: Hee-jin returns home from college to find her missing sister. During the investigation, she hears that her sister had been possessed and her neighbors who knew her sister begin dying one by one…

programme.title: Nostalgia Ep16
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep931932
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1783
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Monday (M) Ep380
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppy’s owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: A poor, bare-footed young man from the countryside arrives in the city to work with the friend of his dead father. When their dye shop is burnt down by a local strongman, he decides to fight back to protect all of them and save the shop.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents’ kung fu styles.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Masked Avengers
programme.desc: The "godfather of the kung-fu film," Chang Cheh, started a winning streak by making the internationally renowned THE FIVE VENOMS. He followed that hit with many more high-flying "bloody good" entertainments featuring the same cast in new roles. But of all the "Venom" movies, this one stands out as perhaps the most chilling. Masked killers are wreaking havoc and instilling terror with their vicious weapons of choice: razor-sharp, gut-shattering tridents. Only three fearless fighters dare investigate, leading to mass murder and magnificent martial arts. Chien Hsiao-hou, future co-star of Yuen Woo-ping's THE TAI-CHI MASTER joins the trio to get tri-pierced. The core "Venoms" themselves handle the intricate, always impressive, sometimes awe-inspiring, choreography in this unforgettable exercise in "grand guignol kung-fu."

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor (The Chinese Boxer) and action choreographer (Jackie Chan's Drunken Master), the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan (Once Upon A Time In China) and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li (Snake In The Eagle's Shadow) everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends’ help.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen’s brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen’s home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan head’s son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon “Thundering Sword” to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: Aadhi promises his grandfather that he will reunite him with his estranged daughter, Nandhini. Posing as a driver, Aadhi enters Nandhini's house but trouble soon follows.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: V - The Movie
programme.desc: A celebrated police officer's run of success is shockingly interrupted by V, a mysterious killer, who specifically challenges him to end his killing spree.

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Veetla Visesham
programme.desc: Elango, a 26-year-old man, is shocked to discover that his mother is pregnant. His struggle to come to terms with the news puts his relationship with his girlfriend, Sowmya, in jeopardy.

programme.title: Maamanithan
programme.desc: A humble auto driver, desperate to improve the standard of education for his children, convinces a real estate agent that he will help him sell all his plots.

programme.title: Mersal
programme.desc: Maaran, a doctor and Vettri, a magician come together avenge their father’s death and to expose the corruption that persists in India's medical industry.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Sridevi Soda Centre
programme.desc: Suri Babu, a lightman, and Sridevi, a girl who runs a soda centre, decide to get married in spite of opposition from Sridevi's family owing to their different castes.

programme.title: Nenjam Marappadhillai
programme.desc: Mariam, a woman raised in an orphanage, is offered a job as a caretaker for a child from a rich family. However, she is sexually exploited by her employer and returns as a spirit to exact revenge.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Golisoda
programme.desc: A group of four teenagers work at the market as laborers carrying vegetable loads to shops. A woman in one of the shops tends to them and cares for them. Inspired and courage by her the boys decide to start a small restaurant in the market and initially, everything is fine.

programme.title: Thangaraja
programme.desc: Manjula falls in love with Raja but he is scared to reciprocate his feelings. Later, he discovers that Manjula's father is the same man who destroyed his sister's life.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Upon being released from prison, Sachi demands to lead a tranquil life with his family. However, fate has other plans for the ex-convict when he encounters a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Dangal
programme.desc: After his failure at winning a gold medal for the country, Mahavir Phogat vows to realise his dreams by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite societal pressures.

programme.title: Hagola Ep46
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep48
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep73
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep24
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep25
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep46
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.desc: Badri, a wealthy man's son, meets Vaidehi at a wedding and sparks fly between them. However, while he wants nothing more than to marry her, she yearns to pursue her dream of becoming an air hostess.

programme.title: Inquilaab
programme.desc: A politician helps a jobless man become a police officer and then uses him for his nefarious activities. After his wife finds out he is being used as a pawn, she tries to change his ways.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh

programme.title: Heroes
programme.desc: Two students embark on a trip to film a documentary focussing on why one must not join the Indian Armed Forces. However, by the end of their project, their perspective goes through a paradigm shift.

programme.title: Albela
programme.desc: Tony, a tour guide, falls in love with one of his clients, Sonia, and tries to woo her. However, Sonia does not reciprocate his feelings since she is in love with another man.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Ram escapes from his home when he learns that his abusive brother-in-law plans to kill him. Justice is meted out when Shyam, Ram's long-lost twin, accidentally takes his place.

programme.title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to get married to an NRI. When she visits Delhi to shop for her trousseau, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree man, and falls in love with him.

programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: Raja, a taxi driver, falls in love with Aarti, a rich girl, and marries her against her parents' wishes. Later, her stepmother tries to create differences amongst the couple.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Rajveer, a police officer, is tasked with protecting a nine-year-old heir, Abbas. However, the job gets complicated when Nazir, a dangerous criminal, seeks to harm the child.

programme.title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
programme.desc: Anshul, Siddharth and Tarun each fall in love at the same time with different women. However, their relationships soon turn toxic and make them realise the dark side of love.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: U Me Aur Hum
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Dr Ajay Mehra falls in love with Piya and soon marries her. They lead a harmonious life until Piya gets pregnant and is soon diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.

programme.title: OK Jaanu
programme.desc: Adi and Tara are ambitious people who fall in love after meeting at a wedding. They decide on a no-strings-attached live-in relationship, but doubt their decision when their careers pull them apart.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Romeo, a ruffian, starts working for Shivraj, a drug lord, and they end up falling for the same girl, Chanda. Soon, a fight between the two ensues to win her over.

programme.title: Rocketry - The Nambi Effect
programme.desc: The life of Nambi Narayanan is full of struggles and accomplishments as an aerospace engineer. However, he faces his biggest challenge while working at ISRO when the world accuses him of treason.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: Maharathi
programme.desc: After his boss, Jai Singh, commits suicide, Subhash, a chauffeur, hatches a plan to win his insurance money. He teams up with Jai's wife, Mallika, to make the suicide look like a well-planned murder.

programme.title: The Enforcer

programme.title: Battle Of The Bulge
programme.desc: By December, 1944 the Allies believe that the Nazi Army is on the brink of total collapse. But the Germans counterattack, pushing the American Army back in a bloody offensive. Now in a battle that could decide the outcome of the war, victory or defeat depends on fuel, without which the German tanks are powerless--and the fate of the world hangs on the outcome of one small, determined fight for a single fuel depot.

But as the war devastates the South, Scarlett discovers the strength within herself to protect her family and rebuild her life. Through everything, she longs for Ashley, unaware that she is already married to the man she really loves (Gable)—and who truly loves her—until she finally drives him away. Only then does Scarlett realize what she has lost … and decide to win him back.

programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 1
programme.desc: The bidders are back and the competition is fiercer than ever! Mo & Ty set their sights on a container from Mexico, but could everything inside be damaged goods? The Israelis pin their hopes on a mysterious wooden crate, and bids go through the roof on a one-of-a-kind open-air container.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 2
programme.desc: Mo and the Israelis partner up on a container from Africa, but will their alliance result in fool's gold? Matt attacks the competition for a can full of Chinese goods, but it could blow up in his face. And later, things take a bizarre turn when a bunch of strange items from an odd collector spark an intense bidding war

programme.title: Container Wars S3 3
programme.desc: Four containers, straight from the Big Apple, make their way to Long Beach, CA. A can full of broken dummies generates some serious buzz, while a billionaire's unclaimed goods have everyone seeing dollar signs. Plus, a one-of-a-kind auction that includes the container itself.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 11
programme.desc: A young man offers his help to the FBI in solving a pair of murders, but when he leads them to additional victims, Jane begins to suspect that he is killer they're hunting.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce--and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents--but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: Gotham S1 5
programme.desc: While Gordon and Bullock search for the source of a new street drug storming the streets of Gotham, Oswald Cobblepot works his way deeper into Maroni’s inner circle.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr take to the court to serve up some seriously personal tennis lessons, and then head to the park for a bewildering game of Now! And tonight's loser must put his face through the ultimate test during a food presentation!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 10
programme.desc: Q, Murr, Sal, and Joe provide a false sense of security to some sassy shoppers at a drug store, and the competition reaches new heights during a rematch of their balloon challenge in the grocery store. And tonight the guys laugh and cry their way through the first ever permanent punishment!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: The guys cannonball into an uncomfortable poolside encounter, and convince strangers to press send on their absurd e-mails. Later, tonight's loser presents a shocking senior citizen initiative to a community planning board.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12
programme.desc: It's foul play when the guys work stadium security! Then, the guys contaminate evidence during a crime scene investigation class. Plus, tonight's loser develops multiple personality disorder when opening for Legends in Concert.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr head to the casino to see if they can play their cards right as Blackjack dealers. Then they team up for a complex guessing game in the park and polish strangers' footwear to an imperfect shine. Tonight's loser takes a pounding on the mound at a Brooklyn Cyclone's game, but it's a mystery lover who is delivering the blows.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 06
programme.desc: Sheldon goes up against WIL WHEATON for the role of the new Professor Proton, while Penny steps in to take care of Halley when Bernadette & Howard are laid up on bed rest.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S6 11
programme.desc: Sheldon learns the University is building a database without him. Also, Mary takes care of a bedridden Mandy and Meemaw.

programme.title: Knight And Day
programme.desc: Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz star in this thrill-ride about a small-town girl hoping she's met the man of her dreams, only to find out the mysterious stranger is a fugitive spy!

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: When Juli meets Bryce in the second grade, she knows it's true love. After spending six years trying to convince Bryce the same, she's ready to give up - until he starts to reconsider.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 9
programme.desc: When Vampires make their way into Lawrence, Carlos corrals the gang to find out why. Latika provides vital information when John gets a scary glimpse into the future.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 07
programme.desc: Sheldon and Bert collaborate on a research project, despite Sheldon's embarrassment. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette coach Raj on how to navigate his relationship with Ruchi.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 08
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard enlist Barry Kripke (JOHN ROSS BOWIE) to help after they learn Sheldon betrayed them by working with the military behind their backs.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 09
programme.desc: The gang flashes back to 2010 as Leonard tries to remember where he kept a potentially valuable investment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 10
programme.desc: Sheldon & Amy develop a unique system to eliminate stress from wedding planning. And Raj "breaks up" with Howard after realizing he's hurting his confidence.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 20
programme.desc: When a classmate's boyfriend threatens to post a humiliating video of his girlfriend online if she breaks up with him, Veronica helps her concoct a vengeful scheme if he doesn't allow the relationship to end peacefully. Meanwhile, Keith searches for Duncan after his parents post a huge reward for information on his whereabouts. Later, as her secret new relationship intensifies, Veronica learns a disturbing fact about the night that she was drugged and assaulted. Recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN appears as Aaron Echolls, and recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO portrays Mac.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 21
programme.desc: Determined to expose the person who drugged and assaulted her at a party the year before, Veronica questions her friends and many rivals about the events that occurred that night at Shelly Pomeroy's (MELISSA HOOVER) house. Meanwhile, when one of Veronica and Wallace's stunts affects Alicia's (recurring guest star ERICA GIMPEL) job at Kane Software, she confronts Keith about his daughter's behavior. Later, in an attempt to get closer to his son, Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) hostsa birthday party for Logan that surprises everyone.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 22
programme.desc: In the shocking, action-packed season finale, Veronica solves the mystery of who murdered her best friend, Lilly Kane--but she betrays someone she cares deeply about in the process.

programme.title: Pennyworth S1 1
programme.desc: In a much darker part of London, Lord Harwood, leader of the Raven Society is having a man tortured for a name… which happens to be none other than Thomas Wayne.

programme.title: Pennyworth S1 2
programme.desc: After surviving the plot against the government, Alfred and Esme decide to get engaged. Meanwhile, Lord Harwood is tortured, and Bet Sykes is sentenced to be executed.

programme.title: Gossip Girl S1 6
programme.desc: Dan is torn between two girls when his childhood friend, Vanessa, returns home and declares her feelings for him, just as he and Serena are trying to figure out what they mean to each other.

programme.title: Supergirl S6 16
programme.desc: With a nightmare monster in National City, Dreamer goes in search of the Dream Totem, but needs to ask her sister (HANNAH JAMES) for help.

programme.title: Pennyworth S1 3
programme.desc: After meeting Esme's wealthy family, Alfred calls off the wedding. Burying his heartbreak in small-time work, Alfred accepts a high-paying, seemingly low-profile job.

programme.desc: Run for the Money - Klinger’s scheme to make a bundle backfires when he makes a racing bet with the 8063rd M*A*S*H unit. Unfortunately for Klinger, his “ringer” world class runner turns out to be the middle-aged, pot-bellied father of the track star. Everyone is sure they will lose their money on the bet until Hawkeye, Hot Lips and B.J. convince Father Mulcahy to run the race. The Father disapproves of the bet but agrees, providing the group will help build a new roof for the orphanage if he wins. They agree and the race is back on. LeMasters from the 8063rd appears to have the race in the bag until Mulcahy tells him about the orphanage, which causes LeMasters to throw the race. Mulcahy surprises everyone when he refuses to cross the finish line unless all of the winnings from the bet are given to the orphanage. They all agree and Mulcahy has two victories.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep10
programme.desc: U.N. The Night and the Music - The 4077th receives a visit from three U.N. delegates and global connections are made. Randolph Kent, a physician from England, shares the bond of snobbery with Charles Winchester, while Capt. Rammurti Lal from India shares his knowledge of Yoga with Hawkeye, Potter and Klinger. Hot Lips sparks a romance with Per Johannsen, a Swedish delegate who turns out to be impotent as a result of an old war injury. B.J. has no time for visitors when his patient must lose his leg after gangrene sets in.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep11
programme.desc: Strange Bedfellows - Charles’ snoring is keeping Hawkeye and B.J. awake at night. When they try and talk with him about it, he angrily denies being a snorer and refuses to discuss any suggestions. The problem continues until Hawkeye and B.J. expose Charles’ snoring to some select witnesses and Charles can no longer deny the truth. Potter is overjoyed when his son-in-law manages to pull some strings to visit him while he is in Tokyo on business. However, Potter’s happiness fades when he finds out his son-in-law has had affair while in Tokyo. Potter nearly tells his daughter during a late night phone call but instead talks with his son-in-law and tells him of his own infidelity years ago. Both men agree to live and learn with some regrets.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep12
programme.desc: Say No More - Lieutenant Curt Collins comes to the 4077th with a leg injury resulting from his heroic actions during a recent battle. A fat embolism takes the young soldier’s life and Hawkeye is left with the unpleasant news of telling the soldier’s father, General Collins. The General react with shock and anger and Hawkeye sees that, for perhaps the first time, the grim reality of war has touched the old soldier. Meanwhile, Hot Lips gets laryngitis and must cancel her plans to meet with a doctor that she has had her heart set on for some time. Charles, while disapproving of her choice in men, does Hot Lips an uncharacteristic good turn by arranging for the doctor to visit her at the 4077th. Hot Lips, already speechless, is also pleasantly surprised.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Friends and Enemies - One of Potter’s oldest friends, Col. Woody Cooke of I-Corps, is amongst the wounded who arrive at the 4077th. Cooke's wounds are minor but there are a lot of serious casualties amongst his men. When Hawkeye and B.J. make the discovery that the men were injured due to Cooke’s error they break the news to Potter. Potter is angered and refuses to believe them until he investigates the story and finds it is true. When he confronts Cooke about the incident, Cooke asks Potter to cover the whole thing up for him. Potter refuses and loses his oldest friend but he also realizes what good friends he has in Hawkeye and B.J.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep14
programme.desc: Give and Take - Charles has been made the 4077th’s charity collection officer and has been lees than productive in his endeavors, so Potter gives him a firm tongue lashing and a 24-hour deadline to make his collection quota. Charles passes the responsibility to Hot Lips by bribing her with a book she has been wanting. Hot Lips in turn gives the job to B.J. in exchange for darning his socks, which to her surprise is a huge pile. B.J., on the other hand, flat-out blackmails Hawkeye into taking the job, while Hawkeye ends up cataloging medical supplies so Klinger will do the collecting. While everyone shirks the responsibility of charity, a young soldier expresses regrets about injuring a Chinese soldier who tried to steal the American’s boot to help his frostbitten feet.

Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon joins an Aussie rancher to round up camels using a specially-adapted off road vehicle and a chopper.

programme.title: Best of Extreme Fishing XL
programme.desc: This special compilation episode features some of the best moments from the popular fishing adventure series starring Robson Green.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - Papua New Guinea is home to a rare fishing prize - often called the best freshwater fighting fish on the planet: the Papuan Black Bass.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Waterberg - Mountains of Life Ep1
programme.desc: In the Limpopo region of South Africa lies an ancient land. From rolling grasslands to rocky gorges, wildlife has learnt to make the most of what’s on offer. This is the Waterberg, a land of plenty.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Goby Effect Ep3
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Brought Back from the Brink Ep1
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat’s teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations Ep4
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontario’s eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Bad Reputations Ep4
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth Ep6
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 - The Borderlands Ep1
programme.desc: Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Risk and Reward Ep3
programme.desc: The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team’s solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who’s ready to fly.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Chasing Mako Ep3
programme.desc: In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators – before it’s too late.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - How Smart Are Sharks? Ep4
programme.desc: Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.
